entries.meaning: (zoology) The part of an arthropod or crustacean posterior to the last segment, often resembling an armored tail or tip of the tail.
examples: Although Crangonya evidently comes very close to Niphargus, it appears to be a good genus, and to differ constantly from Niphargus in the more robust body and in the telson, which is always entire and never cleft as in Niphargus.
